bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice in the Selection of Reference Ambient Conditions for Test Measurements of Electrical Apparatus
IEEE Recommended Practice in the Selection of Reference Ambient Conditions for Test Measurements of Electrical Apparatus

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: It is the purpose of this document to identify and recommended a set of standard reference values for certain ambient parameters which are significant in electrical test measurements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
